demand_subscription: Please subscribe to the following channels in order to continue:
not_subscribed: You have not subscribed to all suggested channels.
share_your_contact: Press "Share contact" button to share your phone number
enter_full_name: Enter your first and last names separated by space, eg. John Doe
confirmation_code_sent: We have sent a SMS with the confirmation code to your phone number
confirmation_code_incorrect: The code you have entered is invalid.
sign_up_success: You have signed up to the olympiad. You will receive a message when it starts.
question_text: You have to submit your answers until {}.
answer_mid_title: Please send your answers strictly in the specified format.
incorrect_answer_format: Please send your answers in the specified format.
incorrect_answer_length: Your number of submitted answers does not match the number of questions. Please review and submit again.

validation_errors.full_name: ❌ Full name does not match the specified format.
validation_errors.dob: ❌ Date of birth does not match the specified format.
